app_descript:
Tiny Scanner

Brief: Tiny Scanner is a robust and user-friendly mobile app that transforms your phone into a versatile scanner. Ideal for work, school, or any location where you need quick document digitization, it enables you to save your scans as image files or PDFs on your device. The app offers various sharing options and is brimming with features designed to streamline your document management.

Core Features:

  • üìÑ Multiple Scan Modes: Choose to scan your documents in color, grayscale, or black & white. üîç
  • ü§ñ AI-Powered OCR: Leverage advanced OCR technology to recognize text in multiple languages and convert your scans into editable and searchable formats such as text, Word, etc. (part of the subscription service). üß†
  • üìè Automatic Edge Detection: Auto-detection of page edges ensures perfect alignment of scans. üìê
  • üîê Security: Protect your important documents by locking them behind a secure passcode and add your signature directly onto your scans. üõ°Ô∏è
  • üöÄ Optimized Performance: Fast processing of scans saves you time and keeps productivity high. ‚ö°

Pros:

  • üëç Easy Organization: Manage your scans efficiently with features for naming, organizing folders, thumbnail, and list views. üìÅ
  • üëç Convenient Sharing: Seamlessly share your documents via email, WiFi to your computer, or directly to cloud services like Dropbox, Evernote, Google Drive, OneDrive, or Box. üì§
  • üëç Universal App: Compatible with both phones and tablets, providing the same functionality across devices. üì≤
  • üëç Flexible Document Sizes: Set your PDF size to standard paper sizes like Letter, Legal, A4, and more, catering to various documentation needs. üóÇÔ∏è

Cons:

  • üëé Function Restrictions on Free Version: The free version contains ads and has limited functions compared to the premium version. üí≤
  • üëé Limited Free OCR Pages: The AI OCR feature in subscription mode allows up to 200 pages per month, which might not suffice for heavy users. üìë
  • üëé Subscription Requirement for Full Features: Access to unlimited scanning and all sharing options necessitates a subscription. üîÑ
  • üëé Automatic Subscription Renewal: Users need to be aware of automatic renewal and cancel at least 24-hours in advance if undesired. ‚è∞

Price:

  • üíµ Tiny Scanner is free to download and use in an ad-supported version with restricted features. The ad-free Premium version with full functionality is available through in-app purchases, costing $3.99 per month or $19.99 per year. üìä

Feel free to reach out for assistance or feedback about Tiny Scanner at [support](mailto:[email protected]).
